Friends

class Os

Detailed Description

A Thread is the basic unit to which the operating system allocates processor time.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Thread::PriorityLevel
 

Priority is used to set the thread priority to predefined values. Negative values are predefined priority levels, positive values are used to set the priority directly.

Enumerator:
PriorityBackground5 
PriorityBackground4  lowest priority level
PriorityBackground3 
PriorityBackground2 
PriorityBackground1 
PriorityNormal 
PriorityForeground1  default priority level
PriorityForeground2 
PriorityForeground3 
PriorityForeground4 
PriorityForeground5

BOOLEAN Thread::Run (  UINT32  stacksize = 4096,
void *  stack = 0
) 
 

Creates the Thread and runs the user-implemented ThreadFn method.

Parameters:
stacksize Specifies the initial size of the stack, in bytes.
stack Designates the starting memory location of the task’s stack.

Reimplemented in ServiceThread.

BOOLEAN Thread::SetPriority (  INT  priority  ) 
 

Sets the priority of the thread, whereas a higher value means a higher priority. If the operating system defines a higher value as a lower priority, a mapping has to be done in the implementation. If negative values are passed as defined in enum Thread::PriorityLevel then the given priority level is mapped to an appropriate OS priority, positive values are set directly.

Returns:
If the function succeeds, the return value is TRUE. If the function fails, the return value is FALSE.

BOOLEAN Thread::SetPriority (  INT  priority  ) 
 

void Thread::SetRequestedStackSize (  UINT32   )  [inline]
 

Requests a stack frame with the given size for the thread.

virtual INT Thread::ThreadFn (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Specifies the entry function of the task. This function will be executed in thread context.

Implemented in EmzAacDecoderThread, EmzH264DecoderThread, EmzMp3DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4EncoderThread, EmzSbcEncoderThread, EmzAacDecoderThread, EmzH264DecoderThread, EmzMp3DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4EncoderThread, AppContainer, GenericWorkerTask, and FfsTestThread.

virtual INT Thread::ThreadFn (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Implemented in EmzAacDecoderThread, EmzH264DecoderThread, EmzMp3DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4EncoderThread, EmzSbcEncoderThread, EmzAacDecoderThread, EmzH264DecoderThread, EmzMp3DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4DecoderThread, EmzMpeg4EncoderThread, AppContainer, GenericWorkerTask, and FfsTestThread.

INT Thread::Yield (   )  const
 

This method causes the calling thread to yield execution to another thread that is ready to run on the current processor. The operating system selects the thread to yield to.

INT Thread::Yield (   )  const
